name: Raging Fists: Retribution
description:
Raging Fists: Retribution is Action Fighting Game based in a sci-fi industrial era. it combines Asian style fighting with sci-fi like scenery. This mashup of style, is complimented with pvp online play. battle other players online for an action packed adventure. Play story mode to learn about each character. train to be the best fighter in the training room! battle a cpu, or battle your friend locally. Controller support included.

Are you ready to fight?
